greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d of n such that sigma(d)*d is equal to n.
comment: a(n) tells how many times in total n occurs in A064987.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} [A000203(d)*d == n], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
xref: Cf. A000203, A064987, A327165 (positions of nonzero terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 18 2019
